If you want to install your Sudoku game then right click on it in the file manager and go "Extract Here", then open up the folder it makes
Go on "Extract" and choose to extract it into your Home folder
Open a terminal (in accessories)
If the folder is in your home folder then type "cd thenameofthefolder" and press enter
The terminal is already in your home folder by default (the ~ means your home) type in "cd thenameofthefolderyouextracted"
The ~ should change to ~/foldername
